txt.en: While Gondor faced the armies of Mordor, the western lands of Elves faced trials of their own. Now that the War is ended, many preparations are underway. Swear your allegiance to Galadriel and Celeborn in Lothlórien, and you will aid the causes of the Elves there, in Rivendell, and beyond.\n\nContacts: Elladan and Elrohir are at Cirith Gorgor, just inside the ruins of the Black Gate.
